location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], Writing from Magil, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 2 November 1802, concerns the recent death of the Persian Embassador [Ambassador]. Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], informs Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, that he has succeeded in establishing amongst the inhabitants of the country where he is stationed the idea that the Embassador's death was accidental.
